snippet: A steady drumbeat of coverage of the gun debate on MSNBC contrasts with that of Fox News Channel, where critics see a lack of interest.
abstract: Steady drumbeat of coverage of gun debate on MSNBC and other news outlets contrasts with that of Fox News Channel, where critics see lack of interest; Fox News cut away from Pres Obama's speech rebuking Senate for failing to pass measure that would have expanded background checks for gun buyers.
lead_paragraph: A steady drumbeat of coverage of the gun debate on MSNBC contrasts with that of Fox News Channel, where critics see a lack of interest.

headline.seo: Fox News, MSNBC and the Gun Debate
headline.main: At Fox News, Less Attention Paid to Gun Debate Than Elsewhere
headline.print_headline: At Fox News, Less Attention Paid to Gun Debate Than Elsewhere
